Wallpapers+ retrieves photos from Google+ and let you set them as your Chrome OS Wallpaper.

Source code is publicly available at https://github.com/beaufortfrancois/wallpapers-plus-chrome-app

------------------------------------------------

Changelog:
1.4:
- Increased minimum chrome version

1.3:
- Polished UI.

1.2
- Fixed wallpaper API changes.
